project_abstract.cdata: The project is a policy reform, management strengthening and institution building operation aimed at : (i) managing industrial forestry production and export earnings in accordance with sustained yield policy; (ii) promoting conservation and tree planting on farms to counteract fuelwood shortages and ecological deterioration; and (iii) strengthening the sector institutions. These objectives will be achieved through : (a) improved protection and management of the high forest, and policy changes in forest fees and concession allocation procedures; (b) development and implementation of a rural forestry program with special emphasis on priority areas in the savannah zones; and (c) the strengthening of forestry education and research.
